pages.text: An automoton holding a Note Block on a Stick will make a sound when engaged. If a music disc is placed in the automoton's item slot, it will play the song when engaged, and stop playing when disengaged.

Otherwise, the automoton will act like a note block. The pitch of the note is based on the number of items held by the automoton, up to 23. If the item inside is a block that would modify a note block's instrument, that instrument will be used.
